preference.name: WRKFLW_preferred_diagram_layout
preference.preference_description: Controls the preferred layout for Workflow Designer UI. Valid values are: * GcLeftToRightLayout: Left-to-Right layout. This is the default value. * GcRightToLeftLayout: Right-to-Left layout * GcTopToBottomLayout: Top-to-Bottom layout * FixedLayout: Manual layout
